description: Try our easy to follow Black Forest Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Black Forest Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make shavings, spread chocolate onto a clean, dry surface, such as marble, stone or glass. Leave until just set but not completely hard. Holding a large knife at a 45 degree angle, scrape chocolate into curls. Note: Vanilla extract is different to vanilla essence.
